name: Kleavor

ability.name: Tree Cutting
ability.effect: Once per turn, you may discard one or three cards from the top of your deck to draw one or two cards respectively.

attacks.name: Axe Crush
attacks.effect: Deals 20 more damage if there are 15 or fewer cards in your discard pile.

flavor: Their giant axes are used to chop down trees. Early societies used the axes as tools.
